volunteer_wait_for_task: We received your application. We will assign you to a team based on your avalaibility. We will send you and email, and your Task will apprear below.
title: Title
name: Name
create_volunteer_profile: Help us to co-create this amazing event. Fill the volunteering form by clicking on the **+** sign
user_help:
This website allows you to give us you Avalaibility to help co-organinzing this event and to propose some amazing performance

- to Volunteer, first fill the form to let us know when you are available and how your want to help
- to Perform, please fill the performance form. Please try to be comprehensive as possible to speed up the application process

We will notify by email about your shift as volunteer. All your shifts will be availabe here. As performer, we'll get in touch with
you. You can follow the state of your application on this website.

Thanks You for being part of this amazing event.
performance_wait_for_answer: We are considering your application. We'll get in touch soon.
volunteer_has_task: Thank you for volunteering. We have assigned you a shift. You will get in contact with you with all relevant information. The Area Ref the person to conctact for all questions about your tasks.
perf_links: Can you give us a pointer to your performance (website, soundcloud, etc) ?
perf_media: An image about your installation for the website/program
perf_description: What is your performance/art installation about ? (might be used on our website)
perf_dimension: What are the dimensions of your installation ?
perf_textiles: Do you use any textiles in your installation ?
perf_textiles_details: Can you give us more details . Are they fire proof (type m1) ?
perf_fire: Do you use fire or pyrotechnic effects ?
perf_fire_details: Can you give us more details ?
perf_sound_details: Can you give us more details ? (dbc, should be in a quite place, etc)
perf_light_details: Can you give us more details ?
perf_help: Do you need help to build your installation ?
perf_installation: How long do you need to install your art piece ?
perf_logistic: How are you going to transport your art piece to and from the venue ?
perf_time: How long will take to install your art piece ?
other_performers: The name of other people involved in your performance.
workshop_space: What are the space requirements for your workshop ?
workshop_logistic: Does your workshop requires a to transport anything to and from the venue ?
performance_details: Can you give us more details ?
performance_accepted_instructions: Your proposal(s) has been accepted and validated. We'll get in touch with you.
performance_wait_for_proposed: We are considering your application. We'll get in touch soon.
stageperf_fire: Do you use fire or pyrotechnic effects ?
stageperf_fire_details: Can you give us more details ?
stageperf_logistic: How long do you need to prepare ? Do you need help to transport your equipment ?
workshop_duration: What is the duration of your workshop ?
workshop_kids: Is this workshop suitable for kids ?
performance_wait_for_proposal: If you want to propose an installation or a performance click on the **+** sign
volunteer_preferences_explanation: Please specify your prefereces and availabilities. We'll assign you to a shift and task.
performance_form_explanation: Please fill this form carefully. We'll evaluate your proposition and let you know as soon as possible.
